reviewtext: Experience shows that when Sony introduces a first new product in its class, they make a killer product to strenghten their image. This camcorder is one of them (the others are their first SACD, first DVD player, first walkman, first digital walkman, first trinitron TV, etc...) This camcorder provides broadcast quality-- sharpness, color saturation are first rate. I also tried other 1 CCD camcorders and none of them come close to the performance and construction quality of TRV900. The only drawback I can think of is the TRV900 has a bit of bluish tone in the color which can't be adjusted and the brightness is one stop too bright (which can be adjusted)
